news.info: Translations are fixed in CATS v0.11.5! Please update.

supporters.displayname: Example Person<3             - Name that gets shown and icon name.
supporters.iconname: Example Person3                 - name of the icon if it differs from the displayname (for incompatible icon chars like '<')
supporters.startdate: 2018-01-24                     - Just an info for us. Date when he got added to the list
supporters.description: I'm a description            - Description is shown when hovering over the name
supporters.website: https://www.mycoolwebsite.com    - Makes the name clickable with a link to a website. Setting it to null makes it a button but not clickable
supporters.other info 1: tier: 1                    - Puts the name on top of the list. Only 1 is available currently
supporters.other info 2: disabled: true             - Hides that person in the list
supporters.other info 3: ignored: true               - Makes that person not getting reported by the supporter check
